segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies that they don’t even notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the girl looks while her brother is about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting more and more, and I’m just waiting for the crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a complete disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off that faucet before the whole kitchen is ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore; it’s too stressful.
segments.speaker: PAR
